channel.title: R on Enterprising & Concentrating
channel.description: Recent content in R on Enterprising & Concentrating

item.title: 生成一个空post的函数
item.description: Jan 14更新 题目中不能有空格等字符，否则报错，新版会提示修改。新版能在建文件后自动打开，但前提是题目中不能含中文，谨记。 #' generate new posts #' #' @param post_title #' @param post_format #' @param post_summary #' @param post_tags #' #' @return #' @export #' #' @examples #' gen_post("R-error-collects", ".Rmd", post_tags="skills") #' gen_post("English-note", ".Rmd", post_tags="word") gen_post <- function(post_title=NULL, post_format= ".Rmd", post_summary=post_title, post_tags="stats") { if (isTRUE(grepl("\\s", post_title))) stop( msg(cli::rule(center = crayon::bold("RM the spetial char in your title!")), startup = TRUE) ) require(magrittr) post_date <- Sys.time() %>% as.character %>% strsplit(" ") %>% unlist %>% .
